Why did she need to go into detail. Like okay I get it it’s not ur first time, just stop describing it. Yes I understand that people don’t  make the right decisions a lot of the time. But another part that bothered me was why did the guy ask if he was better? No fucking way was he going to be better with his first time. Ur not going to be better than a guy that had been doing her for how ever long they were. Well at least they are together in the end, though it bothers me alot.

What a retard MC. She also loved and loves you so where the problem she fucked before. You have more chances to get cucked and cheated with a girl you fucked first time. For every fagg virgin out there never ask a girl this questions.

Most people have past experiences, it depends on you if you'll be the future of that person
massive bruh moment

This a big bruh moment. Making the girl talk about a fake guy is bad taste man. I came here for a wholesome story. Sure, the ending might've implied that she wasn't actually in a relationship with another guy, but it's already been muddled by cuck undertones. It's like telling your life story to someone about how you were raped and molested as a child, your father had cancer and your mother was prostituting you to her friends and then when the person you're telling your story to is crying and heartbroken, you go "actually that was all a lie lol." :)) Bro wtf.
Bitchi ass well
To avoid this happening to you, before you fuck with a girl, just ask her if it's her first or not.
Im hear to read wholesome stuff but wtf i accidently read some bullshit AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

its not that bad but still thats some cuck shit on the MC part "I want to hear it" yes just ask your girl to tell you about her getting fucked while she takes your virginity plus have her tell every single time she got fucked in detail while you fuck her. What kinda cuck shit is that. Its fine if shes just like o its not my first time and then MC be like aight understandable and continued on but MC really had her explain everything in detail. But thats kinda like a double edge sword "im gonna rewrite and make you forget everything in the past" if hes successful then all is good but after a while if he cant satisfy her completely he will lose her for sure cause she will remember those times with the past guy stronger. And lastly whats up with the "Today is the first time ANYONE has came inside me" Why does that "Anyone" make it sound like theres more than just one guy from the past she coulda easily said "actually i lied about one thing and thats that he never came inside me"

this is actually really wholesome. i don't get why some people hate the girl. she was honest and to me, the ending implies that she enjoyed the mc more than that guy. plus she was literally groomed by a guy in middle school so i don't get how that makes her a slut/leads her to the ntr route???

I'm glad the girl being honest even it's painfull to the boy. I had experienced this in my life, and somehow make me hurt because that time I'm still virgin and my GF not virgin anymore. But right now just positive thinking, virginity is not everything. Everyone have their past, just respect them.

I will find the one. Not for me, but for all of you, too. To show you that it is possible to find the one who waited for only me. And I will wait for her, even if I have to wait day and night until tomorrow comes. This is my burden and the burden I carry for you as well. Even if you have long since forgotten, I will remember for you, and I will think of you when that day comes.

body: This hurts.... Here, deep in my chest...

The feeling you feel after this situation is the feeling of injustice and self deprecation. Injustice because she had given herself to other man who morally wasted her and he were pure from the beginning, injustice because he gave everything from himself while for she he was just another one to taste. And self deprecation because you know if you were in this situation, you could not control yourself and you would trow away your castity for a girl morally inferior to you, you fucking SIMP-Cuckold without selfrespect.
